text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActEncounterCode
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pacio-rat/CodeSystem/prat-class-cs

name: TimepointClassValueSet
title: Timepoint Class Value Set
publisher: HL7 Community-Based Care and Privacy Working Group

contact.name: HL7 Community-Based Care and Privacy Working Group

description: Codes for the classification of patient timepoint. This is an extension of the ActEncounterCode value set
